version_description:
-Our hotel search, filter, and promo code functions just received an upgrade. Now booking hotels is much easier and more affordable!
-Booking flights just became a much smoother process with our newly improved interface!
-We’ve improved the customer

-Our hotel search, filter, and promo code functions just received an upgrade. Now booking hotels is much easier and more affordable!
-Booking flights just became a much smoother process with our newly improved interface!
-We’ve improved the customer

1. WeChat Pay has arrived! We now support 22 payment currencies in total.
2. New My Viewed Hotels function keeps track of what you've viewed so you don't have to.
3. Flight plans changed? You can now make changes to your booking directly from the ap

“Hello, World!”
Trip.com is here! Welcome to Ctrip’s new global brand and immerse yourself with an exciting new way of travel.

Discover a fresh new look with enhanced design and navigation to elevate your booking process experience.

Wha

Trip.com is here! Welcome to Ctrip’s new global brand and immerse yourself with an exciting new way of travel.

Discover a fresh new look with enhanced design and navigation to elevate your booking process experience.

2. Save time with a more user-friendly hotel booking experience

Thanks for using Trip.com!
We’re always improving and fixing bugs, update now to see our latest and greatest features for the perfect trip. Hope you love it but either way, don’t forget to rate and comment to spread the love to help us improve! Happy t

1. Improved hotel location based information, including airports and transport hubs, other nearby hotels, and navigation options.
2. E-receipts and itineraries can now be received by email.

1. Improved hotel location based information, including airports and transport hubs, other nearby hotels, and navigation options.
2. E-receipts and itineraries can now be received by email.

1. You can now book train tickets for South Korea and the UK.
2. Receive notifications about flight changes to ensure you always stay updated.
3. Flight searches now include recommendations based on value for money.

1. Never miss out on any ongoing flight & hotel deals.

1. You can now add unbooked journeys to “My Trips”, allowing you to manage your future travel plans in advance.
2. The new multi-city search function for flights makes arranging travel to multiple cities even simpler.

1. Trip.com's Mega Sale is Here! Book now and you'll save up to 10% on all prepaid hotel rooms worldwide!
2. You can now filter hotels by the languages spoken by hotel staff.

1. You can now book car rentals in the app. There are no credit card fees, and almost 60,000 branches in over 5,000 cities around the world.
2. In the new "Things to Do" section, you can purchase tickets, tours, and even check travel guides for popular

1. Hotels can now be filtered by 24-hour front desk service. Improved map navigation features.
2. Select seats for your flight at no additional charge. You can now also view flight on-time history and information about on-board amenities.

1. Optimized for iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max.
2.Add a Siri shortcut to check your travel plans.
3. Minor bug fixes.

1. Flight tickets for adults, children, and infants can now be booked together.
2. For a limited time, you’ll receive a promo code to use on your first hotel booking when booking a flight!
3. Book transfers to and from the airport with ease.

2. Easily share your flight details in one convenient image.

1.Still undecided where to go? Our interactive map shows you the latest low-cost flights.
2.E-receipts are now available when purchasing China Railway tickets.
3.You can now easily purchase access to airport lounges after booking flight tickets.

1.Hotel search made even easier: Filter hotels by the latest discounts, reviews, and more.

New in the app: When booking hotels, you can now exchange Trip Coins for rewards including free breakfast, room upgrades, late check-out, and free cancellation.
Thanks for using Trip.com! We’re always improving and fixing bugs, update now to see our latest and greatest features for the perfect trip.
Create price alerts for upcoming flights. We’ll track the prices and let you know as soon as they drop!
Check out our biggest update yet! With brand new designs and a simplified interface, planning and booking your next trip is sure to be a breeze.

1.For Japanese trains, Shinkansen and JR Limited Express tickets can now be booked online.
2.Added flight recommendations for nearby cities.

Trip.com is now compatible with iOS 13!
1. Use Siri to manage your travel plans.
2. Sign in or register with Apple.
3. We’ve also made more improvements to incorporate iOS 13 functionality.

Trip.com is now compatible with iOS 13!
1. Use Siri to manage your travel plans.
2. Sign in or register with Apple ID.
3. We’ve also made more improvements to incorporate iOS 13 functionality.
You can now book early check in for hotels. To check in before 6 am, select the previous day as your check in day.
You can now book early check in for hotels. To check in before 6 am, select the previous day as your check in day.
